mapper.select: select mbl.movie_buy_num, mc.movie_name, mbl.movie_price, mbl.movie_buy_date from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie mc where user_id = #{user_id} and mbl.movie_code = mc.movie_code

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select mbl.movie_buy_num, mc.movie_name, mbl.movie_buy_date, tt.theater_name, ms.screen_name, mt.movie_start_time, mt.movie_end_time, se.seat_code from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie_time mt, tbl_movie_screen ms, tbl_theater tt, tbl_movie mc, tbl_movie_seat se, tbl_schedule_seat scs where mbl.user_id = #{user_id} and mbl.movie_time_code = mt.movie_time_code and mbl.screen_code = ms.screen_code and ms.theater_code = tt.theater_code and mc.movie_code = mbl.movie_code and mbl.schedule_seat_code = scs.schedule_seat_code and scs.movie_seat_num = se.movie_seat_num and mt.movie_start_time >= systimestamp order by mbl.movie_buy_date desc ) a) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select mbl.movie_buy_num, mc.movie_name, mbl.movie_buy_date, tt.theater_name, ms.screen_name, mt.movie_start_time, mt.movie_end_time, se.seat_code from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie_time mt, tbl_movie_screen ms, tbl_theater tt, tbl_movie mc, tbl_movie_seat se, tbl_schedule_seat scs where mbl.user_id = #{user_id} and mbl.movie_time_code = mt.movie_time_code and mbl.screen_code = ms.screen_code and ms.theater_code = tt.theater_code and mc.movie_code = mbl.movie_code and mbl.schedule_seat_code = scs.schedule_seat_code and scs.movie_seat_num = se.movie_seat_num and mt.movie_start_time <= systimestamp order by mbl.movie_buy_date desc ) a) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}
select count(*) from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie_time mt where mbl.movie_time_code = mt.movie_time_code and mt.movie_start_time >= systimestamp and mbl.user_id = #{user_id}
